name: EmporiaEnergy
0:
”Alexa, turn on Smart Plug”
”Alexa, turn off Smart Plug”
”Alexa, turn on EV Charger”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Emporia Energy Smart Home Skill for Alexa allows you to control Emporia Smart Plugs and Smart EV Chargers with your voice.

After enabling the Emporia Energy Smart Home Skill, you will need to log into your Emporia Energy account and discover your smart devices.

An Emporia Energy account and an Emporia Smart Plug or EV Charger is required. If you do not have an any Emporia Smart Home devices, they can be purchased at https://shop.emporiaenergy.com
